title: The Undesirable Publications (Prohibition of Importation) Act
title_en: The Undesirable Publications (Prohibition of Importation) Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Prohibited Publications Order.
1965.                                                                         213~168
                                                                               282168
                                                                                86170
                                                                               290170

provisions.title: Section 2
provisions.content:
2.-41) The importation of the publications set out in the Schedule
is hereby prohibited.
                                                                              #::367172
                                                                          Schedule.
      (2) Where any publication mentioned or referred to in the
Schedule is a periodical publication the prohibition imposed by sub-
paragraph (1) shall extend to any past or future issue thereof.
               [The inclusion of this page h authorized by L.N. 4119761
           T H E PROHIBITED PUBLICATIONS ORDER, 1965
